m0rjc.ax25.generator.simulatorBuilder

Class SimulatorBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • m0rjc.ax25.generator.simulatorBuilder.SimulatorBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModelVisitor

    public class SimulatorBuilder
extends Object
implements IModelVisitor
    Build a simulator following instructions from the model.
    Author:
    Richard Corfield

      • push

        public void push()
        Description copied from interface: IModelVisitor
        Enter a sub-block of code. Equivalent to open brace in C. In Assembler a label will be created at the corresponding pop(). The location of that label will be used by the #saveReturnOnStack() method and the IModelVisitor.exitCodeBlock(int) method.

        This can be used in condition processing to create a decision tree, and in subroutine processing to create the GOSUB command.

        Client code must ensure that all push and pop balance within a transition.

        Specified by:
        push in interface IModelVisitor

      • saveReturnOnSubroutineStack

        public void saveReturnOnSubroutineStack()
        Description copied from interface: IModelVisitor
        After a IModelVisitor.push() store the location of the corresponding IModelVisitor.pop() on the subroutine stack.

        Usage:

         push()
    saveReturnOnSubroutineStack() // Saves LABEL1
    visitTransitionGoToSharedEntryCode(subroutineNode)
 pop() // LABEL1
        Specified by:
        saveReturnOnSubroutineStack in interface IModelVisitor
        See Also:
        GosubCommand

      • exitCodeBlock

        public void exitCodeBlock(int levels)
        Description copied from interface: IModelVisitor
        After a IModelVisitor.push() GOTO the corresponding POP if levels = 0. If levels is more than 0 then more levels will be exited. This is like the break command in Java and C.

        Examples:

         push()
   exitCodeBlock(0)  // GOTO LABEL1
   push()
     exitCodeBlock(0)   // GOTO LABEL2
     exitCodeBlock(1)   // GOTO LABEL1
   pop()  // LABEL2
 pop()   // LABEL1
        Specified by:
        exitCodeBlock in interface IModelVisitor
        Parameters:
        levels - 0 for the current level, more for greater depths of local code blocks.

      • pop

        public void pop()
        Description copied from interface: IModelVisitor
        Exit a sub-block of code. Equivalent to close brace in Java and C. In Assembler a label will be created, its name determined by the corresponding IModelVisitor.push().
        Specified by:
        pop in interface IModelVisitor

      • visitTransitionReturnFromSubroutineStack

        public void visitTransitionReturnFromSubroutineStack()
        Description copied from interface: IModelVisitor
        GOTO the location held on the Subroutine Stack. This will have been saved by a previous IModelVisitor.saveReturnOnSubroutineStack()
        Specified by:
        visitTransitionReturnFromSubroutineStack in interface IModelVisitor
